doc.title: King of Pavones
doc.plot: "The King of Pavones" is the remarkable story of Danny Mack, the innovative & entrepreneurial man who pioneered the world famous left surf break of Pavones in southern Costa Rica. Through interviews, stories, footage and stills this film chronicles his journeys as Love Machine Films weaves together 8mm and 16mm archival gems from the late 70s early 80's with current interviews with surf legends like: Buttons, Rory Russell, Mike Hynson, Steve Pezman, "Fast" Eddie Rothman, and Joey Cabell.
